title: Fear of Falling
description: Even after all these years, Grady Gordon can’t let go of her pain. Her first and only love affair had come to a brutal end, and all she has to show for it is her daughter Jessie and a broken heart. She’s avoided relationships ever since, all too aware of the risk of surrendering her soul.Nate Hawthorne loves a challenge. Sure he can fix up Grady’s rundown house, and while he’s at it, he’ll take a crack at warming up this prickly lady’s heart.But what begins as lust soon becomes something more – Nate falls deeply in love with Grady, and, sadly, she can’t seem to find a way to love him back.Nate learns that Grady’s carefully constructed defenses are protecting a heart that never healed. What’s more, she hides behind her daughter whenever Nate gets too close. Nate, however, has a secret weapon: Jessie. Enlisting her help, he sets out to earn Grady’s trust and to restore her faith in love.
author: Ellen Ann Dean
